page.title: 09PARK GARDEN NURSERIES.
page.content:
Park Garden{Nurseries}is situated at the junction of Over Lane and Sundays Hill.It is a family business which has been going for 60 years.The present owner needs plenty of staff,and does take on apprentices.They have three large green houses.
Plants are bought from many {wholesalers}from Kent to Worcestershire, and the owner also buys plants from{Holland.}He also acts as a wholesaler for some plants.
The{busiest time}of the year is in May,and the{quietest}in January and February.Although they are expensive businesses to run, the owner thinks that Garden Centres and Nurseries will become more popular in the future.
